hero.title: tional:
hero.subtitle: Smarter AI with Real-Time Knowledge
hero.description: Transform your business with cutting-edge AI solutions powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), Large Language Models (LLMs), intelligent agents, and custom chatbots. Access real-time knowledge and automate complex workflows with unprecedented accuracy.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.description: Comprehensive AI solutions designed to transform your business operations and unlock new possibilities with intelligent automation.

n8nWorkflows.title: n8n Workflows
n8nWorkflows.description: Automate complex business processes with visual workflow automation.
n8nWorkflows.detailedDescription: Transform your business operations with our advanced n8n workflow automation platform. Our solution provides a visual, drag-and-drop interface that makes complex automation accessible to everyone in your organization. With over 500+ integrations and custom webhook capabilities, you can connect any system and automate any process.

ragPipelines.title: RAG Pipelines
ragPipelines.description: Build intelligent knowledge retrieval systems with vector databases.
ragPipelines.detailedDescription: Unlock the power of your data with our Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines. Our solution enables you to build intelligent knowledge retrieval systems that provide accurate, context-aware responses by combining your proprietary data with advanced language models.

aiAgents.title: AI Agents
aiAgents.description: Deploy autonomous AI agents for complex task execution.
aiAgents.detailedDescription: Deploy intelligent AI agents that can autonomously execute complex tasks and workflows. Our AI agents combine advanced reasoning capabilities with tool integration, enabling them to handle multi-step processes while maintaining human oversight and control.

customChatbots.title: Custom Chatbots
customChatbots.description: Create intelligent conversational interfaces for your business.
customChatbots.detailedDescription: Build intelligent conversational interfaces that understand your business context and provide personalized assistance to your customers and employees. Our custom chatbots leverage advanced natural language processing to deliver human-like interactions across multiple platforms.

useCases.title: Real-World Use Cases
useCases.description: See how organizations are leveraging our AI solutions to solve real business challenges and drive measurable results.

internalKnowledgeAssistant.title: Internal Knowledge Assistant
internalKnowledgeAssistant.description: Transform your company's knowledge base into an intelligent, conversational interface that helps employees find information instantly.
internalKnowledgeAssistant.detailedDescription: Our Internal Knowledge Assistant transforms your company's scattered information into a centralized, intelligent system. Using advanced RAG technology, employees can ask questions in natural language and receive accurate, contextual answers instantly. This solution reduces time spent searching for information by up to 80% and ensures everyone has access to the latest company knowledge.
benefits: Instant access to company policies and procedures
Reduced time spent searching for information

customerSupportAutomation.title: Customer Support Automation
customerSupportAutomation.description: Deploy AI-powered chatbots that handle customer inquiries 24/7, providing instant responses and escalating complex issues to human agents.
customerSupportAutomation.detailedDescription: Revolutionize your customer support with AI-powered chatbots that provide 24/7 assistance. Our solution handles routine inquiries automatically while intelligently routing complex issues to human agents. With natural language processing and integration with your knowledge base, customers receive accurate, helpful responses that improve satisfaction and reduce support costs.

dataAnalysisInsights.title: Data Analysis & Insights
dataAnalysisInsights.description: Leverage AI agents to analyze large datasets, generate reports, and provide actionable business insights in real-time.
dataAnalysisInsights.detailedDescription: Transform your data into actionable insights with our AI-powered analysis platform. Our solution processes large datasets in real-time, identifying patterns and trends that would be impossible to spot manually. Generate comprehensive reports automatically and receive proactive alerts about important business developments.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join hundreds of companies already using RAGtional to automate their operations and unlock the power of AI.

demoModal.title: Request a Demo
demoModal.subtitle: See RAGtional in action and discover how our AI solutions can transform your business.
